items.item: Potential problem with duplicate enumeration variables if used in scope. Not problem in C.
We pass R CMD check because we don't add a usage section in the documentation.
But we are also not adding entries for ..., cif and returnInputs.
charRef rather than stringType or stringArrayType.
Use RCIndex (is this RClangSimple ?) or clang's C++ interface to use that to read the C code.
Deal with union in the name of a type. And unions generally
